name: Truck Simulator 2016 Free - North America Cargo Routes
name_original: Truck Simulator 2016 Free - North America Cargo Routes
description:
Truck Simulator 2016 is the most complete and realistic simulation of cargo transportation ever created for mobiles! You can choose a huge set of trucks to drive around the cities and the country side of United States!

Prepare to be amazed with the realistic physics of the simulator and the beaultiful scenario we created for you!

Explore the landscapes and enviroments of the simulation, with a live scenario, with car and air traffic, traffic lights, different weather conditions and a 24 hours sky.

MAIN FEATURES:
- 12 trucks
- 3D cockpits for all the trucks
- 120 missions
- Exclusive missions for each type of truck.
- Realistic physics of the truck.
- Detailed Mountains, trees, buildings, barns, houses, roads..
- Detailed garages and gas stations to park.
- Detailed special effects for the simulation.
- Simulated Weather Conditions, like Clear sky, Storms and Snow to choose in the options.
- Automatic GPS system to help you on your mission.

Drive very early in the morning and feel the day becoming night while you explore the 2000 miles covered by the simulator.

Real life sounds of the trucks and for the city to improve the simulation!

To make the simulator more imersive, play from the inside of truck's cockpit and drive safe through the city.
